alert.note: Alert for Coahoma; Quitman; Tallahatchie; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 4:31PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Yalobusha, southeastern Coahoma, Tallahatchie and southern Quitman Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Ruleville to 7 miles east of Minter City to near Jefferson. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Tutwiler, Coffeeville, Webb, Sumner, Paynes, Dublin, Vance, Sunnyside, Scobey, Oakland, Glendora, Mattson, Distall, Swan Lake, Brazil, Beaver Dam, Albin, Effie and Rosebloom. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
